This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into your personal Spotify listening habits.

## Dashboard Pages

- **Summary**: Overview of your Spotify listening patterns and trends
- **Weekly Patterns**: Analysis of weekly listening patterns and trends
- **Artists**: Top artists analysis and listening streaks

---

*Data is automatically updated daily from my Spotify listening history*
